name: Non-if
description:
Non-if is a game created without any "if" statements (well, actually there are some still). The game doesn't have much going on, as is, and is more of a prove of concept. It is uploaded to avoid making me never publish anything.

If I update this later, Keys and Doors will be coded.
Then More Enemies, a Boss.
And then, upgrades.

I know how to create Randomly-Generated Levels, and that could be the next phase.
IF I update it, but for now, it is as is.
